Package com.distrimind.bouncycastle.crypto.engines

Class Zuc256CoreEngine

java.lang.Object
com.distrimind.bouncycastle.crypto.engines.Zuc128CoreEngine
com.distrimind.bouncycastle.crypto.engines.Zuc256CoreEngine
All Implemented Interfaces:
StreamCipher, Memoable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Zuc256Engine
public class Zuc256CoreEngine
extends Zuc128CoreEngine
Zuc256 implementation. Based on http://www.is.cas.cn/ztzl2016/zouchongzhi/201801/W020180126529970733243.pdf
